headline: Impact Podcast with John Shegerian Announces All-Star Roster for New Season
summary: LOS ANGELES, February 19, 2026--Impact Podcast with John Shegerian has announced a packed roster of sustainability and impact all-stars from many of the world’s leading brands as guests for the new season of the show. The Webby Award honored podcast, complete with a newly designed, user-friendly homepage online, is hosted by John Shegerian, Co-Founder, Chairman and CEO of ERI, the nation’s largest material resource recovery, ITAD and electronics recycling company.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Rockwell Automation (ROK) After Strong Multi‑Year Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Rockwell Automation is priced attractively right now, this article will walk through what the current share price might imply about its underlying value. The stock last closed at US$396.46, with returns of 34.0% over 1 year, 43.9% over 3 years, 74.1% over 5 years, and recent moves of a 2.5% decline over 7 days, a 4.6% decline over 30 days, and a 0.5% decline year to date that may have shifted how the market views its risk and potential.
